We took the bus at the bus station in Avde de Americas (underground station) because we read that the bus stops right in front of the hotel and we could also use our 3-day travelling pass for this ride. The bus trip took of course longer than travelling by underground to barajas airport but we had spare time and were tired of our shopping spree that day. Hotel was perfect; nice helpful staff, good internet facilities, nice room and bathroom. We did not stay for dinner at the hotel because it was a bit too quiet for us as we did not see many guests (on a Friday night). Could be that they all went to bed early ! We booked the shuttle at 05:00 a.m. in the morning. Very nice service to find fresh coffee and some cakes waiting for us in the lobby as such an early time. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great choice for overnight airport stay!”
Reviews.Author: cob2
Reviews.Content: Returning to Philadelphia from F uerteventura, I had a 12 hour layover in Madird, Barajas ariport. Made a reservation at Clement Barajas based on feedback on tripadvisor and was not disappointed. Airport shuttle picked me up within 10 minutes of my call and were equally as prompt and accomodating on my return trip the next day. The staff at the front desk were efficient and extremely pleasant. My room was pleasant, with modern decoration and all amenities I needed and then some (slippers are a nice touch). Overall the accomodations were much better than some 5 star hotels including the Graf Zeppelin in stuttgart and 1/3 the cost. (and the staff was so much more pleasant ) I added the breakfast to my stay and found it to be reasonable value with excellent sleection. I would defintiely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Watch out for thieves”
Reviews.Author: violaidaho
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night at this hotel, on our way back from Tenerife to the US. Since we arrived at the airport, we had to call for the shuttle to the hotel. It was a good thing that we had a cell phone because the public phones in the airport were not functioning. The pick up was prompt and the kind woman at the desk when we checked in gave us instructions on how to go downtown on the subway. We had a nice visit and dinner downtown and the room was ok. Unfortunately, the next morning was a nightmare. We had booked the 8:00 am shuttle, so checked out very close to this time. The shuttle was outside, so we went outside with our luggage but the driver was not there yet. Our mistake was to wait outside. This is not a safe part of Madrid, so please be aware of this!!!! My husband's briefcase was stolen as we waited for the LATE shuttle to the airport. Most likely we were distracted by a woman asking for directions to the bus stop. Although this is a very nice hotel, please do be aware that this is an area frequently by bands of thieves, so plan accordingly.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for eginning or end of trip”
Reviews.Author: demlad
Reviews.Content: We stayed here as our last night before flying out. It was perfect, as reported in other reviews here, especially for the end of the trip. Close to the airport, with a free shuttle. Sign up at least the day before. We did their buffet in the evening after checking in. Best deal we had in Spain. Pasta, salads, fruit, desert, for 8Eu. You can add on an entree if you like, but the basic had enough.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a Madrid airport stopover”
Reviews.Author: pharmagill
Reviews.Content: We booked the Clement Barajas on the back of positive reviews here and they were not wrong. Highly recommended. We had a 4.00 a.m start so the 24hr courtesy coach was very handy. We were after a relaxed end to our short break in Madrid, and judging by the state of those who had to sleepover at the airport we made the right decision. Barajas is not the nicest location but having a coffee in the square was very pleasant. The hotel restaurant looked pricey and was unsurprisingly empty so we went five doors down to a excellent value grillhouse (where we saw all the hotel staff getting their takeout!)

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice”
Reviews.Author: queenvino
Reviews.Content: Great Choice for a hotel near the Madrid airport. Free high speed internet in the lobby is very helpful. Room was clean and cozy. The free airport shuttle was a nice touch. Make sure you know which terminal you are in and when you call listen carefully as to where they will meet you. Make sure you schedule your return shuttle in advance. It was a fifteen minute walk to the metro to get downtown but was an easy commute. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “10-minute Shuttle service to & from Barajas T-1, T-2, T-3, T-4”
Reviews.Author: Chas22
Reviews.Content: Excellent accomodations, tasty, cafeteria-style breakfast, very professional reception and transport staff. Beautiful, new, immaculate hotel to ease that bad connection from Spain.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay near Madrid Airport”
Reviews.Author: rogtravel
Reviews.Content: This is convenient for staying before your morning flight from the Madrid airport. We dropped our rent car the night before and got the hotel van to pick us up and take us back the next morning. (5-10minute drive). Hotel is modern and functional. We ate dinner at the hotel and were somewhat disappointed. There probably are other restaurants within an easy walk but the hotel location is not convenient for traveling back into central Madrid. Breakfast was fine and included in the room price--which was much less than staying in the city center.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: sherylfelice
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific hotel to book in order to be close to the airport. The room was immaculate, bathroom was very clean and nice. The buffet breakfast was excellent. The staff was very helpful. We had a car and parked on the street outside the hotel. They offered us free internet service in the lobby. The air conditioning worked well, and everything was very clean and spotless. The front desk was friendly and professional. Couldn't ask for more. Regards, Shery Goldie
